评论详情: After back fusion surgery I’ve struggled to find a comfortable bra that doesn’t press on scar tissue. Pressure bands, seams, hooks all trigger debilitating pain. This workout bra is perfect.  Seams on the side have minimal bulk and the back is a smooth panel so the fit is snug but not painful. It’s a nice find! Bonuses are a fun design & good price. I’ve spent $100 for bras I have to remove in an hour. This is comfy all day.

评论概述: my chest looks amazing!!! never felt this confident
评论详情: i’ve been looking for a cute yet comfy workout crop top for awhile and this has got to be the best. it’s flattering, durable, AND it has a built in shelf bra. the straps are adjustable which means they will fit amazing and FEEL amazing on you as well. i just feel really good about myself when i’m wearing it :)

评论概述: cute and comfortable - but feels/looks like swimwear
评论详情: Very comfortable and cute, but it has a similar feel and look to swim wear due to the shinier fabric used… someone actually asked me if it was a swimsuit (lol). Fits well and the straps are adjustable.
This top fit like a glove, and I don't need a bra! I can't wait for summer to start wearing it more often!

评论概述: It was quite small for the size I ordered
评论详情: I had to return this as it was too short and tight - I bought my regular size but it was sadly just too small. I liked it though! Nice material and awesome style

评论概述: I used it as a top - not a sports bra
评论详情: This sports bra comes with pads but I put on without pads but my mother blessed me with a 38D! I purchased this with the intent of wearing it as a sports bra, but I accidentally tried it on with a skirt that I purchased from Amazon and I thought this can actually be a cute little crop top! Definitely feels good on the skin probably could have gone up a size but overall it fits really nicely now I need to see how it works when I go work out and I don’t even know to be truthfully honest if I’m even going to wear it as a sports bra now!
I know this is a sports bra, but I’ve worn it at a tank top/shirt on several occasions. I have it in both black & brown …might get another color! Really love it
This was a perfect dupe from what Free People sells. The quality is great. The color is nice and the material is stretchy. This fit true to size.
Honestly this was better quality than my Alo sports bra

I am very glad I purchased this top , I would go buy your bra size I’m a 34c so I ordered the medium and it’s perfect The o my thing I don’t like are the thickness of the removable pads they were taken out and I used different ones from a bra , other than that I’m happy and want more colors !

评论概述: Get this top!! Get the matching bottoms!
评论详情: As a wide rib cage girly, I had to size up!! But loveeeeee it! :)
Good support and cute. Very much like a bikini top in terms of material.
I have a larger chest and I really wanted this to fit! I ended up returning but it’s really cute!!
i am absolutely obsessed with this top. it is incredibly flattering and i get so many compliments on it ! adjustable strap superiority lol
It doesn’t have cups, but it’s not seethrough.  Comfortable, medium support, fine for weight training. True to size (I’m a 34 DD) and ordered a medium.

I've been searching for a good sports bra for ages, and the Move With You Sleeveless Sports Bra exceeded all my expectations! It's so comfortable that I forget I'm even wearing it, yet it provides excellent support during my workouts. Plus, it looks super cute and stylish! It's become my go-to for both yoga and running. High value for the price—I might just need to get another one! Also- a fraction of Alo.
This is so cute I love it. I wish I sized up. I am a 34B, usually an XS-S size, and wish I got a medium. I feel like I can't breathe in the small but if I had gotten a medium it would be perfect.
Love this top. It fits so well, material is high quality and it’s got a built in bra. A bit pricey but just worth it in my opinion. Chuffed with it and always get compliments 😊

Wow, I did not expect to love this so much. Saw someone link this on IG and decided to give it a try in pink (size small). The coloring in the pictures is off, I would consider this shade more of a purple than a pink (still very cute). So glad I did and can’t wait to order other colors. Stretchy, but somewhat thicker material so the fit feels nice. Flattering stitching and design. Breast pads were included and can be added or not.

评论概述: Not the color or fit as expected
评论详情: The color was more of a yellowish tan than a neutral tan and it fit a little smaller than expected. I will say the fabric was SUPER soft and thick. potential for a great top for someone else. Just not me.
I love the soft fit of this top, it’s perfect for hot yoga. I got it in 2 different colors. I highly recommend! A great find
This workout bralette is really cute but unsurprisingly lacks support. It’d be better suited for a hot girl walk than a workout class

I loved the Alo yoga one in store and this maybe even be better, especially for the price.  I will definitely be buying this in other colors.  I’m an xs/s and this for perfect.  I wear a 32c/d 5’4” 121 pounds.  The removable pads seem like decent quality and the material is nice.  Also love the adjustable straps.  Very flattering.
My daughter wears it for dance class… received a lot of compliments! Perfect fit and material is a 10! Highly recommend!
was very excited about this top. i’m 5’6 130lbs and got a medium. had stretchy material and very comfortable. it did have a strange smell but other than that it looks and feels like the alo top
The material is nice and thick. If it had fit, I would’ve loved it. But it’s not tiggol biddies friendly
consistently fell down whilst working out- i would use this more just as a cute top or for a very low impact workout! it’s still v cute ◡̈
One of my favorite tops to wear. Makes me feel very feminine in it. You can dress it up or down.
This is a cute top! Keep in mind that it runs small and this is bathing suit material not work out material. A little overpriced. Over all its cute though.

4 stars. The detailing is really cute and I believe probably quite flattering on a number of body types, but I'm not the biggest fan of the construction. For one. the top is REALLY low cut, making it not super functional for most workouts (if thats what you're using it for), even low impact ones. The straps are also set really wide, so the top itself doesnt offer much in the way of support as they kind of will slide down/off your shoulders despite where the strap length is set.  Overall cute look, but just not good for its intended design as a workout/sweat top.
I absolutely love this top. It is super comfy and looks exactly like the Alo top. It has adjustable straps and is true to size. Would definitely recommend!
I loved this soooo much, good feel, fit and so trendy!

I really love how this top looks and flatters me! The material is nice as well. The only negative to me is since I have a bigger chest, working out probably won’t happen in this top! It’ll be more for athleisure daily wear!
Such a cute workout top! Fits nicely and has good padding for your boobs.
Dupe for the Alo Yoga Airbrush Streamlined Bra Tank. Honestly I like the fabric of this one better and it’s half the price!
It’s cute. But not if you have a bigger than A cup chest tbh. Anything other than that is okay but not for any type of exercise, I’m always having to adjust it.

评论概述: Skip the top and get the romper
评论详情: I bought this top twice in both a medium and a large (believe the other reviews and size up!) but unfortunately had to return it both times.  Standing up it looks fine but the second you bend over, the bottom of the tank curls and rolls up which isn’t ideal for workouts.  I bought it in the romper version and love it so much more! No more adjusting and tugging to keep in place. Also Super good quality / double lined

I return so many clothing items from Amazon but THIS!!! Literally so cute/ I'm a 32B/32C depending on the day and this fit me so good and even gave me cleavage! Adjustable straps and comes with inserts for the bra part - in love! Totally worth the money!
I purchased a medium and it fit like an extra small. I am a 34C and it squished the girls. I suggest sizing up 2 sizes if you’re bustier.
It’s very flattering and seems like great quality. It’s form fitting and not too stretchy but it keeps you sucked in. The armpit is a little uncomfortable, but overall I love it.

Super cute athleisure top. It comes with pads to insert which make you feel fairly secure and held in if you have a bugger chest. I think this bra is better for aesthetic purposes and not a real work out. It’s really cute but I wouldn’t use it for more than light yoga or running errands. If you have a smaller chest you’ll like this more because the white piping will hit you in the right spot. It’s really cute on either way I’m glad I bought it.

Not quite right. The white straps are sewn just a little too far to the outside (at least for me and my A cups) that it pinches and rubs under at the armpit/chest point. I tried both the small and medium and had to return. Would have been nice though.

This top is so cute but it is hard to get the sizing right. I typical wear a 2 or 4 (or XS/S) and sized up to a medium in this top. It fit well except the bottom band digs in a bit even when sizing up. This might not matter for some depending on height but it laid uncomfortably against my ribs. Wouldn’t work out in this but works well for athleisure.

评论概述: Super cute but defo not for yoga
评论详情: Love the adjustable straps, option to use extra bra padding or not, and the overall style. Downside, as others have mentioned, definitely not downward-dog approved. I guess it may depend how flowing the girls are or not, but more than likely you will not have support to bend over and keep the ladies secured. Still, super cute for general workout or a daytime athleisure vibe.

评论概述: Cute but be careful if you're bustier
评论详情: I wanted to love this top so much for the gym, but it's definitely more of a lounge around the house sort of top if you're a bit top heavy - it can be a bit revealing! Love that it has adjustable straps and even though I don't wear it out and about kept it anyways because it's still super cute!

评论概述: So so cute, sadly did not fit my bust
评论详情: I LOVED this design and colorway (lilac and white) -- sadly the Medium looked vulgar on me because of where the neckline hit my bust. I probably could've replaced with a Large but it didn't seem worth it because it's just a low cut top to begin with. Smaller chested ladies, this is SO adorable!!  (For reference, I am a 32D and usually wear a Medium in sports bras and fitted active tanks but Small in streetwear.)

This top feels like a really thick bathing suit. Not soft or comfortable at all. Would not recommend purchasing. It’s giving cheap. It is cute but as far as wearing it for any physical activity I’d say skip it.

评论概述: Size one or two sizes up!!
评论详情: Its a great quality and love the colors, it looks just like in the picture but definitely would recommend to size up! I usually wear small on tops but I read the reviews and a lot of them says to size up so I got a medium but would be better if I ordered a Large. Otherwise, I love this top and 100% recommend!
Great dupe for the alo top but not great for bigger chest
The style runs small. overall nice quality and design.

评论概述: So so cute but runs small
评论详情: Perfect Alo dupe. Quality is really good. Just beware it does run small. I usually am between a small and medium tops and the medium was very tight. Still keeping it but I probably could have gotten away with a large. There’s very little stretch. I’m a b cup and wouldn’t recommend for anyone over a c because even mine spill out. Overall great for the price!
Love it!! So cute and comfy

Very cute, pretty colors. Not workable for any sport, unless its like meditation, very still. Full Bathing Suit material. I actually wear it at the pool/beach. Very cute! I ordered an M.  Im 140 lbs, 5'6. It fits perfect. But feel like if I gain 1 more pound might not look cute on me at all, lol.

This is a great file for some of the more expensive brands. Comes with padded cups you can take in and out of the bar. It’s great material, feels very expensive. Would repurchase in more colors. It is short, so you could not wear it as a shirt or it would be a very high crop top. Could be worn with high waters leggings for more stomach coverage. Overall so cute!
Love this top! It’s giving Alo Dupe!

This top was so cute, I was sad the straps fetl so far off the shoulder that I felt like I was going to have to push them back on my shoulders every once in a while. If the can use this design but make the straps more in the middle I’d but it again.
Super supportive, however my bust spills out of this (I think I’m like a 38C??) More casual, athletic wear type of style!
Fantastic fit. Looks just like Alo top. Flattering and durable for yoga!
Very cute but I think I should’ve gotten a size bigger
I loved the top the fabric and the way it looks but it does NOT run true to size. I ordered a medium and it fit like a XS. Please be aware of this when ordering :/
This sports bra makes me feel elegant & sexy while I workout. The most comfortable sports bra. I am usually an M but had to size up to “ L. I bought both black & white. They are both beautiful.
High quality and comfortable! I am 5’1/95 lbs, and took a small.
Runs small? Or just not stretchy. Was not flattering.

This is a such a cute, comfortable and trendy top… I ordered a size medium and it fit perfectly! I would recommend sizing up because it is a tad bit snug but I wore it on a hike and it was perfect. One thing to note is it is a little revealing so if you are top heavy keep that in mind! I am a B cup for reference.

评论概述: If using it for workouts , size down
评论详情: It is very cute and fits great but using it for workouts is a no go. I made the mistake to use it for a hitt workout class and I was holding the top up the entire time. Other than that it’s great!
It was exactly as what I expected. Fit true to size. Size M fit absolutely perfect! Bought in more colors 😍

Looks wise, this sportsbra is perfect! However, it’s not the most comfortable. I’m a 34DD and typically a M/L 6/8 in tops. I ordered this in a large and it fits, but there is no stretch making it difficult to put on. I also love the length of this!
This has potential to be a cute top, But the logo in the back kind of killed it for me, which makes it look more like athletic wear. Was hoping for it to do both.
So cute, fits well! I wear a 36DDD and I am wearing a size large!

评论概述: So nice!! Such a great deal
评论详情: Material is nice and not thin, the pads are supportive and it’s a great fit. It seems like a dupe for hollister sports wear.  I’m 5”10, 165 lb, and I’m around a B cup, I got a medium and it fits perfect and even give me a little lift. Totally would buy again and I wish they had matching short!
Amazing fit and great quality. Great value product for a reasonable price.
Very cute and seems like good quality. I’m usually a small/medium. I got a medium and it is very tight. Exchanging for a large. Make sure to size up.

I have had my eye on the alo yoga top for $51 and found this one on Amazon for a fraction of that!! I’m 126lbs with small chest and the small fits me perfect. There are no pads in the top but I prefer that. It does come with cup inserts but the material is thick to where nothing shows. #founditonamazon

It’s pretty comfortable. It does however run small. I’m 5’3 and 135 pounds and I got S/M but it’s pretty tight. The cut is very low and makes my 34C boobs look huge without a bra. I would think it’s a going out top and not a workout top. It’s really sexy.

I have the actual Alo bra and unfortunately this isn't a true dupe. The fabric is different, the real one is buttery with light stretch, this one feels like typical workout gear with absolutely no give, this doesn't come with any padding like the original does, and the actual fit is off and not very flattering. I returned immediately. It looks decently close to the dupe but that's where the similarities end
does run small, but the medium fit perfectly probably not for fuller chested ladies
This top is marketed for yoga or pilates. It seems very sexy. I decided to pair this top high waisted jeans and heels.

评论概述: MY FAVORITE ATHLEISURE PURCHASE FROM AMAZON
评论详情: SOOO many compliments on this! I have multiple colors. Looks expensive. Fits true to size. Padded and lined.
Probably would size up! Very cute and flattering, has the material of a really nice swimsuit

I will say I love this too and it’s very cute—get compliments at the gym, HOWEVER, it has no support. I am constantly pulling it up, adjusting it and worries my girls will fall out. Would not repurchase because of this.

Did a Pilates class in it and felt stylish and cute while breaking a sweat (always a motivator). I think it can also be worn out as a casual or a bit dressier outfit, but haven’t. It sits low on the chest but I small chested so doesn’t affect me much.
this bra is so sexy and flattering, i have bought 4 more. they are not for people with a large bust and wont give a lot of support if you are running doing HIIT. I love this look!

评论概述: About to buy it in every color!
评论详情: I took a risk and actually took this top on vacation still in its package because I didn’t have a chance to try it on before packing and it did not disappoint! I felt so confident and was even getting compliments on my outfit the entire night! 10/10 highly recommend!!
Looks just as advertised! Quality is really nice in person. A bit on the tighter side, but I’m super happy with it!

Love it! It does run a bit small but I didn’t wear a sports bra underneath and it worked for me. Perfect for walks, hikes, Pilates, etc - lower impact workouts. Would not wear for running/hiit workouts. Very comfy and cute - will order other colors once they’re back in stock!
I love this top! its so flattering I get sooo many compliments on it! the material is soft and great quality.
Super cute top for working out! Supportive

评论概述: Love the look, didn’t love the fit
评论详情: This is too cute. I loved the look and fabric. I didn’t like the band at the bottom which felt tight and not comfortable. I have a small waist and still it was tight on me.

Super cute and fabric seems of good quality. Usually I’m a true size small. This too was so tight it was hard to get on. I would definitely size up. I don’t  even have a huge chest so was shocked at how tight it was. Can see it having good support though.
Now I know why this top was trending… loved the way it looks and fits on me

Very cute and excellent quality. Fits well but the space for the chest is not that roomie. I’m a 34B and small fits well, but at the verge of almost spilling out a little. So I’d keep that in mind when buying.

This tank is very supportive for the girls and makes them look big and perky (I am a smaller chested Woman). It isn’t super stretchy so if you like a stretchier fit you may not like. I think it’s a good value for the price.
Excellent support for a smaller chest.  Comfortable and flattering. It has the look of an expensive brand for a much lower cost. Many compliments when worn. Color is even prettier than the picture.

评论概述: Been wanting the Alo one but 9mo preg
评论详情: I've been wanting the alo version but $60+ for a top when you're 9 months pregnant seems silly so went with this one and so glad I did! Such great soft material, love the adjustable straps. Looks kind of qt with the bump!
It’s a cute top, but I wasn’t a fan of the logo. It’s on the lower left corner of the top. Might not bother some people but I returned it.

I was so excited for this but there is no support in the bra, and it’s not good for any actual workout movements (unless you want your girls to pop out) I had to leave my sweatshirt on the whole workout because every movement I would have flashed everyone. Cute for the aesthetic if you don’t wanna work out in it

评论概述: would size up but super cute
评论详情: so flattering, love wearing this and get a ton of compliments on it. Would say it has little stretch and I would size up. It is slightly uncomfortable to wear for several hours but for the gym it's perfect.

This top is amazing!! It is so flattering and comfortable. I wish it came in a million other colors - I would buy them all. I get so many compliments and looks great with any bottoms! 10/10 would recommend!
Quality is amazing - high end work out quality. Size up if you have a large chest. I’m normally a M. Got a L and I still spill out a bit. Everything else fits great. Feels amazing on.  Chest - 32DD

I am always a size small and don’t require too much support, everything was so cute about this product I just wish I got a medium because there isn’t any stretch! Although not being stretchy helped to give some level of support, it digs into your waist line. Size up!
